title: Release/3.39.0
description:
(long) release notes:
----------------------
* Mark all _error_index fields as obsolescent
* Add plugin provenance structure in ids_properties
* Extension to the EDGE_PROFILES IDS
* Adding n_tor to the coordinate_identifier list and clarify its definition throughout the Data Dictionary
* Add a description node in all code structures
* Extension to the SPECTROMETER_X_RAY_CRYSTAL IDS
* Changes to the PLASMA_INITIATION IDS
* Initial version of the new FOCS IDS
* Add a new constraint in the EQUILIBRIUM IDS, as well as more constraint positions
* Extension to the CORE_PROFILES IDS: new profiles_2d structure
* New B_FIELD_NON_AXISYMMETRIC IDS
* Revision and simplification of the filter_spectrometer structure in the SPECTROMETER_VISIBLE IDS
* Correction of triangularity definition in the EQUILIBRIUM IDS and introduction of new quantities similar to the triangularity
* Extension to the PULSE_SCHEDULE IDS
* In the WAVES IDS, change node types to complex numbers in the full_wave structure to describe adequately the e_field and b_field components
* Extension to the LANGMUIR_PROBES IDS
* Add optical elements and fibre bundle description in CAMERA_IR, CAMERA_VISIBLE and SPECTROMETER_VISIBLE IDSs
* Extension to the REFLECTOMETER_PROFILE IDS and new REFLECTOMETER_FLUCTUATION IDS
* New RUNAWAY_ELECTRONS IDS
* Extension to the EDGE_TRANSPORT IDS
* Extensions to the WAVES IDS
* Revision of the SPECTROMETER_MASS IDS

> Note: this version requires AL >= 4.11.5 in order to avoid error when reading core_profiles from MDS+ pulsefiles generated with DD < 3.39.0

title: Feature/IMAS-4725
description:
Example of adding alternative coordinate metadata (new feature), and processing the paths with the ";" separator correctly, then display the result in the HTML documentation. 
Note: I had to cherry-pick a few improvements that we did recently in develop/3 to make this development. 
Here is the new core_profiles HTML documentation, to see the new display of all coordinates (primary and alternative ones), on all nodes using the primary coordinate.


* Add alternative coordinate metadata in the DD, in the core_radial_grid generic type (IMAS-4725)
* Fix coordinate calculation logic for IDSDef.xml (IMAS-4661)
* Generalize the BuildAbsolutePath so that it works for an arbitrary number of OR statements (IMAS-4661)
* Add (itime) to coordinate path (IMAS-4661)
* Adapt BuilAbsolutePath template to deal with the ";" alternative coordinate separator (IMAS-4725)
* Print the alternative coordinates in the HTML documentation (IMAS-4725)

title: Improvement/IMAS-4682
description:
Let's first address the parts related to the Equilibrium IDS in the ticket IMAS-4682. See the new SVG file for the new definitions.

* Correction of the average triangularity definition (IMAS-4682 and IMAS-3105) --> As pointed out by Simon Mc Intosh, this definition was wrong anyway and we can correct it as part of DDv3 evolution. There is a consensus that it should be the average of the upper and lower triangularity

* Adding new quantities triangularity_inner, outer and minor to the Equilibrium IDS (IMAS-4682)

If we are happy with all this, I will proceed to the extensions needed for the PULSE_SCHEDULE IDS

title: IMAS-4583 added idsfields functionality
description:
Feature : List all fields (with their full path from root of the IDS to leaf) of a given IDS

$ python idsdef.py idsfields -h
usage: idsdef.py idsfields [-h] idsname

positional arguments:
  idsname     Provide ids Name

optional arguments:
  -h, --help  show this help message and exit

----------------------------------------
Output
Listing all fields from ids :'amns_data'
ids_properties
ids_properties/comment
ids_properties/homogeneous_time
ids_properties/source
ids_properties/provider
ids_properties/creation_date

title: Mark all _error_index fields as obsolete (IMAS-4481)
description:
As mentioned in discussions around https://confluence.iter.org/display/IMP/Data+Dictionary+changes+for+major+version+4, future removal of `_error_index` fields shall be preceded by DDv3 release where the quantities are marked obsolete (as some of these fields are set for active quantities in active IDSs).

This PR mark ALL of `_error_index` fields as obsolete: @imbeauf unless you have some XSL magic to do that in active cases only, I hope this is acceptable.

title: Release/3.38.0
description:
Release notes:
* Extension to the SUMMARY IDS.
* Extension to the EQUILIBRIUM IDS. 
* Extension to all EDGE IDSs. 
* New PLASMA_INITIATION IDS. 
* Refactoring the geometry matrix in the CAMERA_VISIBLE and SPECTROMETER_VISIBLE IDSs. 
* Correct some units in the distributions IDS. 
* Extension of the WALL IDS.
* Add definition of syntax to identify path to sub-structure within IDSs (for provenance and reference).
* Introduce installation as a Python package with pip, with simple helper module (parser + search).

title: Release/3.37.0
description:
Release notes:
* Modifications to the GYROKINETICS IDS. 
* Extension to the SPECTROMETER_VISIBLE IDS. 
* Extension of the SUMMARY IDS with local/separatrix_average. 
* Extension to the PULSE_SCHEDULE and PF_ACTIVE IDS. 
* Moving a global quantity from the PF_ACTIVE IDS to the SUMMARY IDS. 
* Addition of a new geometry type for 2D contours (PF_ACTIVE, PF_PASSIVE). 
* Extension to the MHD IDS. 
* Renaming of the main array of structure of the EC_LAUNCHERS IDS and simplification of time bases. 
* Extension to the EQUILIBRIUM IDS. 
* Modifications to the WALL IDS.
* Disambiguation of current and voltage sign in COILS_NON_AXISYMMETRIC IDS.
* Adds new ggd grid subset identifier: full_wall.

title: Release/3.35.0
description:
This is to start preparations for the next release of the DD since we have users waiting for the updated spectrometer_x_ray_crystal IDS.

Please feel free to propose some succinct release notes.

* spectrometer_x_ray_crystal/dd_spectrometer_x_ray_crystal.xsd a été modifié en ligne avec Bitbucket
* Clarifying definitions of Te, Ti, v_tor proxies (IMAS-3908)
* Change definition and correct wrong identifier metadata (IMAS-3908)
* Adding new quantities in spectrometer_x_ray_crystal/channel/crystal (IMAS-3908)
* Relocation of a non-fully-generic complex type into the spectrometer_x_ray_crystal IDS (IMAS-3908)
* Add explicit cocos metadata in the dd_data_dictionary.xml.xsd file
* Indicate the chosen COCOS in the HTML documentation
* Fixing NBC metadata in the Langmuir Probes IDS (IMAS-3980)
* Remove superfluous units metadata in the Summary IDS (IMAS-4000)

title: SPECTROMETER_X_RAY_CRYSTAL IDS : introducing counts instead of photon_counts, detection_effiency, and redefinition of profiles proxies (line integrated Te, Ti, Vtor) (IMAS-3908)
description:
This is addressing IMAS-3908. Note that I kept counts_n as FLT, although in theory this should be an integer, to avoid potential issues with representing large numbers with INT type.

I have also addressed the "profiles_line_integrated" structure as discussed recently with @vezined (the previous te_proxy, ti_proxy were not adequate).

title: Release/3.33.0
description:
* Extensions to the THOMSON_SCATTERING, CAMERA_IR, EQUILIBRIUM and LANGMUIR_PROBES IDSs with an outboard midplane radial coordinate (IMAS-3721)
* Addressing comments from the Pull Request (IMAS-3721)
* Introducing feature IMAS-3696 on a small part of the DD extension IMAS-3678
* Remove errorbar nodes for system limits (with "limit" in the node name) (IMAS-3696)
* Correct midplane definitions (some have inverted dr_dz and dz_dr) (IMAS-3721)
* Making the lowest index convention explicit in the midplane_identifier definitions
* Add a description of shunt measurements in the MAGNETICS IDS and remove the temporary "poloidal_sol_current" structure from the DIVERTORS IDS (IMAS-3674)
* Adding the introduced_after_version tags (IMAS-3674)
* Preparing for release 3.33.0

title: Feature/IMAS-1464
description:
Adding metadata about COCOS-dependence (and needed transformations) into the DD. Metadata are inserted directly in the leaf nodes (when possible) and a mechanism to handle generic structures used in different contexts is provided.
These COCOS-metadata are purely incremental and don't interfere with the rest of the DD.

These metadata produce:
- Additions to the HTML documentation : the COCOS information is displayed for the relevant nodes in the HTML documentation (dd_doc)
- CSV files gathering the information, potentially usable by a cocos-conversion library. These files are installed in $IMAS_PREFIX/share/doc/imas/cocos.

title: Addition of a dynamic delta_position structure to the THOMSON_SCATTERING IDS (IMAS-2828)
description:
Since the variation around the average position of the laser/beam intersection is small (< 1 cm on MAST), I treat this as a perturbation, with a delta_position structure. 
Another way would have been to put directly position as fully dynamic, but I think most machines don't take into account small variations of the laser path, resulting in a static position.

title: Release/3.25.0
description:
I will add other PRs as/when they are merged to master.

* Fix Alfven Non-ASCII character
* Addition of rho_pol_norm to all 1D grids (core_* and edge_profiles IDSs) and creation of dedicated internal structures for edge_profiles using this new radial coordinate (instead of the previous rho_tor_norm coordinate used for the core_* ones) (IMAS-2635)
* Use indented style for xml.
* Renaming and clarification of steering angle definitions in EC_LAUNCHERS IDS (IMAS-2662)

title: Extension/gyrokinetics
description:
New gyrokinetics IDS based on the new international Gyrokinetic database GKDB. 
Although powered by its own SQL-based technology, to make it IMAS compatible the GKDB variables have been named using IMAS conventions and its internal SQL tables follow as close as possible the structure of the new gyrokinetics IDS. 
A reference publication for GKDB is about to be sent to an editor, thus it is important to include the gyrokinetics IDS in the next public release of the DD

title: Adding documentation on geometrical moments to the equilibrium IDS (IMAS-1127)
description:
I think the outcome of the long-lasting tracker item 1127 is that no ones needs alternative definitions of the triangularity, they are for the moment calculated internally by each code and could eventually be calculated by a standard library to be developped.
With this Pull Request, I would like to publish the documentation defining the present elongation and triangularity fields, which has been pending for a long time. I have attached it in SVG format as recommended by Simon.
I hope that this PR can be validated (superseeding the very old and blocked PR#102), and that we can then close also the IMAS-1127 tracker

title: Modifications of the spectrometer_visible IDS (IMAS-1600)

Addition of a few new static nodes for description of the diagnostic + renaming of the two structures grating --> grating_spectrometer and filter --> filter_spectrometer. This allows to be more explicit and to add the "grating" node just below "grating_spectrometer". 
Ors is a reviewer of this pull request because he is the only one to my knowledge to be impacted by this renaming of the two structures, buts it's trivial to adapt. Please approve the PR.

I attach also the updated HTML documentation so that you see the outcome.

title: In the EQUILIBRIUM IDS, move the GGD grid outside of the main time array of the structure to enable it having its own time base.
description: The present IDS structure forces to copy the GGD mesh on every time slice of the equilibrium, while in many case, the mesh doesn't vary with time. With this update (similar to what we did recently on the edge_* IDSs), the GGD mesh can have its own time base (and in most cases will be stored only once for a whole pulse). This will allow an increase of performance since writing all finite elements description every time is a burden.

title: Release/3.15.1
description:
* Unification of the grid identifier for the 2D grid common to the EQUILIBRIUM and MHD_LINEAR IDSs
* Replace space by underscore and add the unique attribute
* Adapt to IMAS-constants conventions; add unique attribute to identifiers, add attributes identifier and create_mapping_function on the root level. In the names attribute, replace spaces with underscore and slash with _or_
* Added identifier for neutrals, for identifying the types of neutrals: cold/thermal/fast/nbi
* Add identifier to select between the species electron/ion/ion_state/neutral/neutral_state/neutron/photon; used in distributions and distribution_sources
* Adjust numbering to the HTMS standard (still question marks about "cold-neutrals" and "bootstrap"). Update naming to always use underscore between words. Group sources according to types.
* replace space with underscore in identifier names
* Rename as name was too long when parsed to Fortran. Fix spelling; the plural of equation does not have an apostrophe. Do not use apostrophs to denote derivatives, since this will cause problems when translating to Fortran; replace with y-prime
* in utilities/dd_support.xsd, add links to the identifiers neutral_identifier.xml and species_reference_identifier.xml
* Renaming transport_solver_numerics_solver_io_equation_boundary_identifier.xml into the shorter name transport_solver_numerics_solver_bc_identifier.xml in order to ba able to parse to Fortran
* in coordinate_identifier.xml, standardise the names for velocity-space coordinates; order the coordinates by the physical meaning
* add new identifier: wave_identifier.xml
* Add reference to the wave_identifier.xml
* core_source_identifier.xml: Include new source types custom-<j> as discussed at the Split Code Camp
* dd_core_sources.xsd: Add missing link to neutral-identifier
* Rename the neutral_identifier to neutrals_identifier. Fix the constants-names in species_reference_identifier.xml, transport_solver_numerics_solver_bc_identifier.xml and coordinate_identifier.xml. Add missing attributes to constants-element in equilibrium_profiles_2d_identifier.xml
* Renumber inverse_rhopolnorm_m from 23 to 24 since 23 was already used
* Start modification of edge_profiles and wall IDSs related to IMAS-1144
* Continuing IMAS-1144 related modifications
* Separation of ggd grid, physical quantities and fast varying quantities in edge_profiles, edge_transport and edge_sources (IMAS-1144)
* Bugfix false positive builds: saxon transform warnings are fatal.
* Initial modifications of the NEUTRON_DIAGNOSTIC IDS (IMAS-1272)
* Added new identifier, core_instant_changes_identifier.xml, to describe types of instant changes in the core plasma state
* update to core_sources/core_source_identifier.xml: two new types of sources cold_neutrals and bootstrap_current
* Rename type of instant change to be compatible with the naming in e.g. core_sources_identifier.xml
* Rename type of instant change to be compatible with the naming in e.g. core_sources_identifier.xml. (IMAS-1154 IMAS-1296)
* Correction of some coordinate metadata. Correction of data types in the charge-exchange IDS (solves IMAS-1283)
* Added the mhd_linear/mhd_linear_grid_type_identifier.xml
* Corrected reference to transport_solver_numerics/transport_solver_numerics_solver_bc_identifier.xml in the XSD schema
* Renamed identifier transport_solver_numerics_bc_identifier.xml
* Add missing underscores in mhd_linear/mhd_linear_grid_type_identifier.xml (IMAS-1154)
* Merge equilibrium/equilibrium_profiles_2d_identifier.xml and mhd_linear/mhd_linear_grid_type_identifier.xml into a single identifier utilities/poloidal_plane_coordinates_identifier.xml
* rename identifier name inverse_psi_equal to inverse_psi_equal_arc, to follow the convention used for the other identifier names
* Added new coordinate type for equal-arc poloidal angles
* Update info in header of utilities/poloidal_plane_coordinates_identifier.xml
* Update headers of identifiers
* Add poloidal coordinate systems with poloidal Fourier modes
* Completing modification of edge_* IDSs related to IMAS-1144
* Move URL type documentation to the html_documentation folder (IMAS-1274)
* Corrections to the documentation of the "fast sampled quantities" in the edge_* IDSs (IMAS-1144)
* Extension of the neutron_diagnostic IDS as requested per IMAS-1272
* Metadata corrections in several identifiers XML files as requested in PR-117.

title: Release/3.11.0
description:
To create 3.11.0.  I won't actually merge until all PRs are approved.

* Modification of the PF_ACTIVE IDS (turns_with_sign changes type to FLT_0D). Solves IMAS-1030
* Redesign of the PF_PASSIVE loops geometry (PF_PASSIVE IDS) to make it identical to the PF_ACTIVE geometric elements description. Solves IMAS-950
* Extension of the outline_2d_geometry_static complex type to add the description by a list of arcs of circle (extends all IDSs using this complex type). Partially solves IMAS-921.
* Corrected spelling in dd_versions.html
* Clarification of sign convention in pf_active
* Add a link from the top IDS documentation to the version history (and back from there to the top IDS documentation)
* Technical modification of xsd_2_IDSDef.xsl, an error detection test was creating false errors
* Addition of thermal density and pressure to CORE_PROFILES and CORE_INSTANT_CHANGES IDS. Solves IMAS-1075.
* Correct spelling of vacuum in MHD_LINEAR IDS. Solves IMAS-1081.
* Move control_parameters one level up in transport_solver_numerics IDS (email from D. Kalupin)
* Change name of two nodes in transport_solver_numerics IDS which were using forbidden names and created C++ bug in release 3.10.2. Solves IMAS-1084
* Added a few missing metadata in PF coil related IDSs
* New REFLECTOMETER_PROFILE IDS
* A few corrections of the reflectometer_profile IDS before its first release
* Addition of mobile limiting surfaces in the WALL IDS
* Clarification of definition in the wall IDS
* Correct spelling of array of structureS (plural) in complex types names of dd_support.xsd
* Addition of momentum sources and transport terms at ion level in CORE_TRANSPORT and CORE_SOURCES. Solves IMAS-1085
* Prepare for releasing 3.11.0

title: Changes in PF_ACTIVE and PF_PASSIVE structures
description:
These changes solve a series of JIRA requests from Lynton Appel in view in the integration of EFIT++ to IMAS. Some of these issues are still under discussion though, thus so far they cannot be included in this Pull Request.

* Modification of the PF_ACTIVE IDS (turns_with_sign changes type to FLT_0D). Solves IMAS-1030
* Redesign of the PF_PASSIVE loops geometry (PF_PASSIVE IDS) to make it identical to the PF_ACTIVE geometric elements description. Solves IMAS-950
* Extension of the outline_2d_geometry_static complex type to add the description by a list of arcs of circle (extends all IDSs using this complex type). Partially solves IMAS-921.
* Corrected spelling in dd_versions.html
* Clarification of sign convention in pf_active

title: Release/3.10.2
description:
Once approved I will release this version of IMAS (i.e. tag, merge and build on ITER HPC).

* Started to redesign the 1D solver part of the TRANSPORT_SOLVER_NUMERICS IDS
* Removed the "profiles_1d" structure from TRANSPORT_SOLVER_NUMERICS IDS (the development of this structure was initially requested in tracker IMAS-854, then it was decided to abandon this structure - no one ever used it).
* Completed redesign of transport solver numerics following July 2017 discussions on IMAS-854
* Cleaning up transport_solver_numerics by removing the "profiles_1d" structures which are not wanted anymore
* Extension of the NBI IDS for dynamic beam tilting
* Extension of the SPECTROMETER_VISIBLE IDS for detailed optical system description, in link with beam emission spectrocopy modelling
* Correction in the list of boundary conditions for transport_solver_numerics/transport_solver_numerics_solver_io_equation_boundary_identifier.xml
* Precised definition of spot_diameter
* New SOFT_X_RAYS IDS
* Add power density field for calibrated data
* New GAS_PUFFING IDS
* Homogeneization of the nodes for naming/identifying a unit of a subsystem in the various actuators : added an "identifier" string to EC and IC antennas, and adding a "name" and "identifier" string to all actuator units in the Pulse_schedule.
* Rename gas_puffing into gas_injection (not released yet). Solves IMAS-784.
* Clarification of documentation (IMAS-866)
* Removal of the ACTUATOR IDS (as a decision from IMAS-780)
* Prepare for releasing version 3.10.2 of Data Dictionary

title: Release/3.10.0
description:
Release v3.10.0 of DD

* Additions to the SAWTEETH IDS (IMAS-826)
* Additions to the CORE_INSTANT_CHANGES IDS, making it mirror the CORE_PROFILES/profiles_1d structure and turn it to ACTIVE lifecycle status (since it now fully mirrors core_profiles which is already in ACTIVE status). Solves IMAS-851.
* Start modification of transport_solver_numerics IDS
* Completed a first revision of transport_solver_numerics, although some discussions remain in tracker IMAS-856
* Precised the definition of crash_trigger in the sawteeth IDS (IMAS-826)
* Increase charge_state maximum number in the AMNS_DATA IDS
* Clarify documentation of the PF_ACTIVE IDS + add the capability to attach an URL to a node for further documentation
* Add HTML (SVG graphic) documentation for PF connections
* Detail for documentation
* Fix bug in transport_solver_numerics/dd_transport_solver_numerics.xsd
* Prepare for releasing 3.10.0

title: Release/3.9.0
description:
Please check new DD release version.

* changed units of coherent_wave/beam_tracing/beam/length from W to m. IMAS-856
* Implemented optional display of errorbar related nodes in the DD documentation
* Add volume/surface integrated quantities to profiles_1d and global quantities in core_sources, solving IMAS-863
* Add a resistivity node to the PF_PASSIVE IDS, correction of resistivity node definition in the WALL IDS. Solves IMAS-849
* Add disruption related quantities to the SUMMARY IDS
* Technical fix (rearrangement of complex types) to make utilities/dd_support.xsd lighter (preventing IFORT compilation otherwise). This should be temporary and solved by moving to Fortran 2003 (no need anymore of the ids_copy routines)
* Further fix for reordering complex types
* Further reordering of complex types
* Fix include path in dd_em_coupling.xsd
* Further include corrections (Windows ashes)
* Update version documentation before creating a PR
* Modification of the ordering of the wave identifier in the distributions IDS
* Prepare for releasing 3.9.0

title: Release/3.7.0
description:
After this merge I will tag the DD with 3.7.0 and install it (with UAL 3.3.10).  If there are any other changes needed before this release, please push them to this branch before approving.

* Extension of the PULSE_SCHEDULE IDS. Replacement of li (becomes obsolescent) by li_3 in core_profiles. Precised some sign conventions in the documentation of the core_* IDSs
* Start renaming/splitting antennas into ec_antennas and ic_antennas (IMAS-504)
* Split the ANTENNAS IDS into EC_ANTENNAS and IC_ANTENNAS (relates to IMAS-504) + harmonize definitions and namings between pulse_schedule and ec_antennas (launching angles)
* Update HTML documentation for release 3.7.0

title: Feature/core edge harmonization
description:
This is needed for the development of the modular plasma simulator (description of neutrals and electric field). Modifications of the "active" parts of the structure have been done following the lifecycle rules (fields are marked as obsolescent instead of being removed). This is thus a minor revision towards tag 3.3.0.

* Updated core_profiles, distribution and distribution_sources with 1) harmonization with edge_profiles regarding the description of vector components (e_field, velocity) 2) separation of the ion/neutral structures (neutrals were put under the ion structure before
* Harmonization of the other core_* IDSs (source, transport, instant_changes) by separating the neutral and ion species into two similar structures

title: DD 3.1.0
description:
* Remove cocos variable (IMAS-44)
* Removed obsolete utilities/DD_Support_Jo_Errorbars.xsd
* Progress on DD extensions, in particular two new IDSs added for the Plasma Simulator
* Final decisions on the edge_profiles IDS structure. The core_* structures have been made similar, as well as the equilibrium IDS for the metric coefficients (covariant, contravariant)
* Further changes to edge_profiles IDS and corrections of namings in mhd_linear (to follow the official list of defined acronyms)
* Generalization of the "element" substructure for describing molecules (used in the edge_profiles) instead of single element ions to the core_* IDSs, to make them have a consistent structure
* Updated lifecycle information in various IDSs and dd_versions.html in view of tag 3.1.0

title: Remove cocos variable (IMAS-44)
description:
Coordinate transformations should be handled in a code's wrapper to
the Data Model (DM), not in the DM itself.

If it's later found necessary to re-introduce the concept of COCOS numbers, they can be added to "active" IDSs without having to bump the DM's major revision number - the converse is not true.

title: Feature/prepare for installer
description:
Let's pull in (fast-forward) the changes from feature/prepare_for_installer branch into develop/3:
   *  Add products of make to .gitignore
   *  Do not overwrite SAXONICA_DIR, it is set by installer/environment
   *  Removed dynamic 1D string data type fro mthe temporary IDS, since it is not handled by the access layer yet

The changes do not affect the Data Model, they are cosmetic. 
Although the last commit by Frédéric is also cosmetic, it probably should have had it's own topic branch. But since we won't notice it after the deletion of the branch, let's not bother creating a new bugfix branch for it.

Please all review (and approve) the changes. After develop/3 is fast-forwarded, we can go ahead and rebase the other feature branches onto the new head of develop/3.
